backend/main.mo: Defines a Motoko actor that stores timestamped readings, supports adding and retrieving readings, builds DTO responses, and includes a simple greeting endpoint.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing configurationâ€‘related frontend fixes, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend components, hooks, utilities, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark mode theming.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point with optional runtime hook for injecting the backend canister ID.
frontend/public/env.json: Static runtime configuration file containing a placeholder backend canister ID.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with authentication controls, configuration card, latest reading display, and readings table with refresh logic.
frontend/src/components/HttpLoggingInstr: UI card that resolves the backend canister ID, shows HTTP endpoints, handles loading and configuration failure states, and supports copying URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates an authenticated or anonymous actor using runtime config and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, creating AuthClient instances and exposing login state and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to poll the backend actor for all readings or the latest reading.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting numeric values and converting bigint timestamps to readable dates.
frontend/src/lib/runtimeConfig.ts: Resolves the backend canister ID using a prioritized fallback chain with caching and optional env.json loading.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling theming, plugins, and custom color/typography extensions.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current architecture, issues, and feature requirements related to backend canister ID resolution.
